title: New Client
body: I have the new client, but it runs slow. How do I get the legacy client back, without launching the new client, first?

I've noticed the beta client acting worse and worse sense it's release. Initially I experienced some lag or sluggishness after maybe three or four games and it got progressively worse the more I played without  reloging, it also never seemed to affect my in game experience. As time went on the lag became more and more consistent and began as soon as I logged in and even got to the point where it seemed to cause me to DC during champ loading just before a game, I found myself relogging before ever 2nd or 3rd game. I just deleted the beta client, riot has a lot of work and a lot of convincing to do before I go back. verdict as of now: 1/10 very poor... I am very dissapionted as i do like the new look of the beta client and was very happy with it for the first few weeks, it feels and though there has been too much attention spent on adding to the beta without enough attention paid to how well it works as a whole. I run into several bug every day so much to the point I no longer report them, honestly with how much time I spend reporting bugs and problems I probably should just apply for a testing job.... you're better than this Riot.

Hello! I want to report a new client bug. When i started match my game broke and I saw only grey screen. I restarted my laptop and then new little update came out and I had to wait. When I wanted to log in I heard only music. I restarted my laptop again new client tell me "Username or password is incorrect...". Then i change my client to old and everything work perfect. I prefer new client and i can't play on it.

The recent patch enabled an option to toggle performance for cases like this.  If you're still having issues though you can return to the legacy client at any time:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
